Body.ChangeFathers: Function: If snake eats, transfer one of the objects from the storage to the body using transform.SetParent(Transform)

GridStatus.ClearArrayValues: Function: Clears both the list of empty spaces to 0 items and the gameArray to everything = 'e'
GridStatus.GridUpdate: Function: Recieves an int[] to change the spaces where there are segments of the snake to 'f', Using a 2 elements array as input

MovementBehavior.Enable and Disable: Region: Contains the MonoBehaviour functios OnEnable and OnDisable, enables and disables the input
MovementBehavior.Awake: MonoBehaviour Function: Initializes the input object
MovementBehavior.Update: MonoBehaviour Function: Runs the function Direction()
MovementBehavior.Direction: Function: Gets the input from the joystic, or keyboard and processes it to the directions Up, Down, Left and Right, assigning those values to the variable inputDir which runs every Update()
MovementBehavior.DirectionCheck: Function: Gets the value of the inputDir and compares it with diferent situations such as: - If the snake is not moving (Start of the game) it can change to + or - X axis and only in the + Y axis-, - If the snake is moving in the + or - Y axis, it can only change to + or - X axis -, - If the snake is moving in the + or - X axis, it can only change to + or - Y axis -
MovementBehavior.DirectionCall: Funtion: Public function to call the DirectionCheck(inputDir) function
